About

I'm a software engineer! These days I work in frontend web development. In the past I've worked for Arcturus Studios making VR experiences with Unity and C#, and hyperspektiv improving the glitch creation UI in Swift. In my spare time I like to make music, art and games.

I have a BSc in mathematics and music from Dalhousie University. I spent a lot of time studying classical piano and graph theory.

My other pastimes include dancing Argentine tango, reading fiction, and fawning over greyhounds I meet in the park.
